question: The success of Bardoli Satyagraha gave rise to which one of the greatest leaders of the independence struggle?
explanation: The Bardoli Satyagraha took place in 1928 in the state of Gujarat. Vallabhbhai Patel was the leader of the satyagraha. The main purpose of the satyagraha was to reduce the tax. The satyagraha campaign made Vallabhbhai Patel one of the main leaders of the independence movement.
